entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Cranbrook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 p.m. PDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Hazy becoming local smoke early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 1 May 2023
